net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_CharSheet_Util_calculateProficiency
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip: Calculates and updates the proficiency bonus for the token based on the classes property. Expected formats are: 'Fighter 2' 'Druid 3 / Wizard 10' Returns 0|1 (Boolean) - true: classes were parsed and proficiency updated; false: classes could not be parsed. When returnining '1|true', the current token's proficiency value will also be updated.
